Title: Prohibits the sale or offer for sale of any cosmetic product or personal care product containing PFAS substances
Summary: Prohibits the sale or offer for sale of any cosmetic product or personal care product containing PFAS substances.
LawCode: Amd ยง37-0117, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to prohibiting the sale or offer for sale of any cosmetic product or personal care product containing PFAS substances
